scripts.ableton:copy-script: set -- ~/Music/Ableton/User\ Library/Remote\ Scripts && mkdir -p "$1" && rm -rf "$1/AbletonJS" && cp -r "$(pwd)/midi-script" "$1/AbletonJS" && rm -rf "$1/AbletonJS/_Framework"
scripts.ableton:logs: tail -n 50 -f ~/Library/Preferences/Ableton/*/Log.txt | grep --line-buffered -i -e RemoteScriptError -e RemoteScriptMessage | sed 's/info: RemoteScriptMessage: (AbletonJS) //'
scripts.ableton10:start: yarn ableton:kill; yarn ableton:clean && yarn ableton:copy-script && yarn ableton10:launch && yarn ableton:logs
scripts.ableton11:start: yarn ableton:kill; yarn ableton:clean && yarn ableton:copy-script && yarn ableton11:launch && yarn ableton:logs
scripts.version: node hooks/prepublish.js && git add midi-script/version.py && auto-changelog -p -l 100 && git add CHANGELOG.md
